sentence: The Sheraton was recently remodeled and at same price
Location is great and my room rate of less than a hundred per night gives this property a 3 instead of a 25
we had a great stay excellent price great service
Nice market store however felt that the prices were twice the price when comparing the exact same t shirt to one available at a rest stop along the turnpike
Nice room for the price
Decent price convenient to disney
There is a reasonably priced food service and a decent size gift shop within the hotel
Besides the friendly staff you get what you pay for
Good hotel with reasonable rates good location pretty outside
I enjoyed the staff and they allowed me to check in early when traveling over night at no extra charge
This manager and the car parking charges will make me start to look elsewhere in the area where there many hotels equally or better priced offering better customer service and free breakfast
10 dollars night bad againThe building itself seems to have received improvements but my room this time was pretty smaller than the 1st time
Now the parking is not free of charge anymore
It was also never listed that they charge parking per night here
Recently visited and continued to enjoy the accommodations but was disappointed to discover you are now charged a fee to park your car
The one less star is because charging 14 daily for self parking with such a huge surrounding parking and the type of hotel makes you mad
The girl at the front desk could n’t tell me why I was being charged more than the price that was advertised on Expedia
I did n’t like having to pay 14 to park my own car overnight there that seems a little ridiculous
food extremely slow and over priced
When I received the statement it had a 995 charge for Data Service which we never requested or used
